root.name: Rise of Prussia
root.description: Overview Rise of Prussia is a turn based strategy game covering central Europe during the Seven Years War. Each turn constitutes roughly 15 days and is resolved under the WEGO method. Rise of Prussia features over 100 new leaders and 300 untis. Players get the option to choose between two factions: Prussia its allies, led by Frederick II. Austria and its allies.Each faction has their own set of unique bonuses. The main campaign contains 10 scenarios that cover several sections of the war, with the final grand campaign covering the entire seven years. The game takes place in Germany and its immediate surroundings.System RequirementsOS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows7 (98/2000 not supported)Processor: Pentium® IV 1800 MHzMemory: 1024 MB RAMHard Drive: 2GB hard disk spaceGraphics: 128 MB DirectX 9.0c video cardSound: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound cardDirectX®: DirectX® 9.0c or higher
